metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Gentle life lessons presented in a musical format, much like Bluey's focus on emotional intelligence.

metas.name: Peg + Cat
metas.description: Introduces early math concepts in a fun and engaging way, similar to Curious George's problem-solving approach.

metas.name: Sesame Street
metas.description: A classic educational program that uses songs, stories, and characters to teach children about numbers, letters, and social skills.

metas.name: Arthur
metas.description: Deals with everyday childhood issues in a relatable and heartwarming manner.

metas.name: The Magic School Bus
metas.description: Takes kids on exciting science adventures, fostering curiosity and a love for learning.

metas.name: Clifford the Big Red Dog
metas.description: Teaches valuable lessons about friendship, kindness, and responsibility through the adventures of a giant red dog.

metas.name: Wild Kratts
metas.description: Combines adventure and zoology, exploring the habitats and behaviors of animals around the world.

metas.name: Octonauts
metas.description: A team of undersea explorers who rescue sea creatures and protect the ocean environment.

metas.name: Puffin Rock
metas.description: Gentle and beautifully animated series about a puffin chick and her little brother exploring their island home.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: Stop-motion animation that encourages imaginative play and problem-solving skills.

metas.name: Doc McStuffins
metas.description: A young girl who fixes toys and dolls, promoting empathy and caring for others.

metas.name: Dinosaur Train
metas.description: Combines a love of dinosaurs with lessons about science, natural history, and paleontology.

metas.name: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse
metas.description: Introduces basic math and problem-solving skills in a fun and interactive way with familiar Disney characters.

metas.name: Paw Patrol
metas.description: A team of rescue dogs who use their skills to protect their community, promoting teamwork and problem-solving.

metas.name: Super Why!
metas.description: Focuses on literacy skills through interactive stories and games.

metas.name: WordGirl
metas.description: A superhero who fights crime using her impressive vocabulary skills, making learning new words fun and exciting.

metas.name: Sid the Science Kid
metas.description: Encourages young children to explore and discover the science all around them.

metas.name: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
metas.description: Takes kids on exciting adventures to learn about science and the natural world with the help of the Cat in the Hat.

metas.name: Zoboomafoo
metas.description: Features live animals and teaches kids about different species and their habitats.

metas.name: Bear in the Big Blue House
metas.description: Teaches preschoolers about emotions, problem-solving, and friendship in a warm and comforting setting.

metas.name: Little Bear
metas.description: Gentle stories about a young bear's adventures with his friends and family.

metas.name: Franklin
metas.description: Focuses on the everyday challenges and triumphs of a young turtle as he learns and grows.

metas.name: Caillou
metas.description: Illustrates the daily life and experiences of a young boy, offering relatable situations for young viewers.

metas.name: Kipper
metas.description: Simple and charming stories about a friendly dog and his friends as they play and explore.

metas.name: Spot
metas.description: Animated shorts about a playful puppy's adventures, perfect for younger viewers.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A charming series about a polite and well-meaning bear from Peru who navigates life in London.

metas.name: Numberblocks
metas.description: Introduces early math concepts through colorful and engaging animated characters.

metas.name: Alphablocks
metas.description: Helps children learn phonics and how to read through animated characters representing letters.

metas.name: Molang
metas.description: A sweet and gentle series about an enthusiastic and joyful rabbit and his shy and quiet friend.

metas.name: Hey Duggee
metas.description: A group of animal friends participate in activities and earn badges, promoting teamwork and problem-solving.

metas.name: Sarah & Duck
metas.description: A quirky and charming series about a young girl and her best friend, a duck, as they embark on imaginative adventures.

metas.name: Chuggington
metas.description: Follows the adventures of trainee trains as they learn to become useful members of their community.

metas.name: Olivia
metas.description: Animated series following the adventures of a spunky pig and her family, known for its humor and creativity.

metas.name: Pete the Cat
metas.description: Based on the popular children's books, this show promotes positivity and self-acceptance.

metas.name: The Stinky & Dirty Show
metas.description: Animated adventures of best friends, Stinky the garbage truck and Dirty the backhoe loader, who learn to solve problems together.

metas.name: Ask the StoryBots
metas.description: Answers kids' questions through fun songs and sketches.

metas.name: Charlie's Colorforms City
metas.description: An imaginative and colorful series that uses the classic Colorforms to tell stories.

metas.name: If You Give a Mouse a Cookie
metas.description: Based on the popular children's book, this show explores the consequences of actions in a fun and engaging way.

metas.name: Trash Truck
metas.description: Gentle stories about a boy and his best friend, a trash truck, who embark on adventures together.
